snippet: The Obama administration’s hopes of persuading Chinese leaders to crack down on the daily barrage of theft and espionage over the Internet are likely to be difficult.
abstract: Vice Pres Joseph R Biden Jr opens annual strategic talks with Chinese leaders by repeating United States’ accusation that electronic theft of American intellectual property could undermine relationship between world’s two largest economies.
lead_paragraph: The Obama administration’s hopes of persuading Chinese leaders to crack down on the daily barrage of theft and espionage over the Internet are likely to be difficult.

headline.main: Differences on Cybertheft Complicate China Talks
headline.print_headline: Differences On Cybertheft Complicate China Talks
